Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.bubbles

Class PlayerBubble

java.lang.Object
game.model.entities.Entity
game.model.entities.MovingEntity
game.model.bubbles.Bubble
game.model.bubbles.PlayerBubble
public class PlayerBubble extends Bubble
The PlayerBubble class represents a bubble generated by the player. This bubble can trap enemies and has a specific life span, speed, and travel time.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerBubble

      public PlayerBubble(float x, float y, float width, float height, float xSpeed, float airSpeed)
      Constructs a PlayerBubble with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the bubble
      y - the y-coordinate of the bubble
      width - the width of the bubble
      height - the height of the bubble
      xSpeed - the horizontal speed of the bubble
      airSpeed - the vertical speed of the bubble

  • Method Details

    • getEnemy

      public Enemy getEnemy()
      Gets the enemy trapped in this bubble.
      Returns:
      the trapped enemy, or null if no enemy is trapped

      public void setEnemy(Enemy enemy)
      Sets the enemy to be trapped in this bubble.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to trap in the bubble

    • hasEnemy

      public boolean hasEnemy()
      Checks if this bubble has a trapped enemy.
      Returns:
      true if an enemy is trapped, false otherwise

    • getTimeHorizontalMoving

      Gets the time this bubble will continue moving horizontally before starting to rise.
      Returns:
      the time remaining for horizontal movement

      Sets the time this bubble will continue moving horizontally before starting to rise.

    • pop

      public void pop()
      Pops the bubble, releasing any trapped enemy and removing the bubble from the game.
      Specified by:
      pop in class Bubble

    • popAndKill

      public void popAndKill()
      Pops the bubble, kills the trapped enemy, and awards points to the player. Also causes nearby bubbles to pop and kill their trapped enemies.

    • updateEntity

      public void updateEntity()
      Updates the bubble's position and state based on its remaining life span and travel time.
      Overrides:
      updateEntity in class Bubble
